visit_types.extra_info: Every 365 +1 days (patients under 18 can have one per calendar year)
visit_types.rules: NO OTHER Complaints or CONCERNS. All Annual Visits / CPE must be more the 11 Month apart, No booking if its any closer. Please advise pt to wear loose clothing (no corsets or one pieces) and no body oils nor lotions because it will affect the EKG process and results.
